similar_jobs: Senior Software Engineer Jobs in Canada
job_description:
ImEX Systems is an industry leader in the collision repair software industry. Located in Vancouver, BC, we have been creating software that helps our clients run their business better for 30 years. We have recently launched a new web based version of our software and are rapidly expanding in Western Canada and the United States.

We are seeking a Senior Full Stack Developer/Team Lead to lead our team and products. You will be responsible for overseeing the entire software development process, from conceptualization to deployment of our application. You should be a hands-on leader with a strong background in both front-end and back-end development and the ability to handle significant portions of the development process independently. We use a PERN (Postgres, Express, React, Node) stack for an enterprise SaaS application with a rapidly growing user base.

You are:
An authentic human
Driven to succeed
An expert problem solver
Passionate about technology
Motivated by exceptional results
Someone who cares about your clients
Looking to add more value than just code

You will:
Lead the development of scalable and robust web and mobile applications using modern technologies and best practices.
Design and implement product features with input from business analysts and clients.
Collaborate with the team to define the architecture, technical specifications, and requirements of application.
Ensure high-quality code through code reviews, testing, and continuous integration.
Create the structures and processes required to grow the development team.
Maintain thorough technical documentation for the application and development processes.
Provide inputs to the product roadmap based on emerging technologies, trends and practices.
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues in collaboration with the team.

Requirements:
Post-secondary education in Computer Science, Software Development, Computer Engineering or a related field.
Seven years of experience in full stack development and distributed systems.
Demonstrated experience and deep expertise in software integrations and implementations.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate, build and manage relationships with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
Strong and innovated problem-solving abilities with a strategic mindset.
Experience integrating front and back ends of web applications while considering issues such as scalability and security.
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.


Languages: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, GraphQL
Programming/Frameworks: React, Redux, React-Native, Node, Express, Hasura
Containerization: Docker
AWS: ECS, RDS, EC2, S3, Elastic Beanstalk
Databases: Postgres
Testing: Cypress or equivalent frameworks
Project Management/Version Control: JIRA, Bitbucket, Git

This is a fully remote position that allows for flexible working hours within reason.
